resources.string: Do you want to clear the entire list of files?

If you activate triggers, the selected files will be deleted.

\n

Important: File deletion doesn\’t work in BFU mode. If you enter the duress password in BFU mode, file deletion will start after the phone is unlocked. If you set up the app to destroy itself, it will do so only after all files have been deleted. That’s why it is recommended to avoid using this mode and instead delete the profile with your secret files if you can grant the app enough privileges.

You can select files to be deleted after entering the fake password here. In this menu, you can only choose files that do not require root permissions for deletion.

\n

To add a new file or folder, tap the + button.

\n

You can delete a file from the list, clear the list, or edit a file’s priority. Files with higher priority (higher number) are deleted first. Don’t forget to enable file deletion by tapping the enable icon in the top bar!
You denied access to files. This may cause some issues.
